verses.name: Malachi 2:4
verses.text: And ye shall know that I have sent this commandment unto you, that my covenant might be with Levi, saith the Lord of hosts.

verses.name: Malachi 2:5
verses.text: My covenant was with him of life and peace; and I gave them to him for the fear wherewith he feared me, and was afraid before my name.

verses.name: Malachi 2:6
verses.text: The law of truth was in his mouth, and iniquity was not found in his lips: he walked with me in peace and equity, and did turn many away from iniquity.
